hypothesis_content.title: MiCA Implementation Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, when 20-day realized volatility for BTC drops below 35% (current 42.3%) AND daily trading range compresses to <2.5% for 5 consecutive days, a breakout in the direction of the first >3.5% daily move will persist for 7+ days with >65% directional consistency.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regulatory clarity (MiCA/UK consultations) reduces uncertainty tail risk, allowing compressed volatility to resolve directionally. NEUTRAL regimes exhibit mean-reverting volatility, creating coiled spring setups. Post-compression breakouts in regulated environments show higher persistence due to reduced regulatory surprise risk.
entry_conditions: Daily high-low range <2.5% for 5 consecutive sessions
First daily close with >3.5% move from previous close

exit_conditions.take_profit: 7 days after entry OR +12% return, whichever comes first
exit_conditions.time_exit: If no directional follow-through within 3 days (close below entry for long, above entry for short)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout direction reverses within 3 days >60% of time OR compression periods lead to continued chop (no clear breakout) >40% of instances.
